title: What's the Meaning of Love? Where does it Come From?: A Doctoral Student with a Dissertation on Love
description:
Sam invited Karen on his channel and graciously gave The Meaning Code the opportunity to also record.  Sam's side had some sound problems, but if you are patient, you will be rewarded by his rich and poetic thoughts.

Sam Glenn asked if I'd appear on his channel to talk about our internet space and to discuss his dissertation on Love. Along the way, we bring in Plato, Plotinus, Aristotle, David Bohm, Erich Fromm, and we discuss desire, delight and sacrifice.

I'm looking forward to the next conversation with Sam when he appears on the Meaning Code in the New Year.

Here's the video of D C Schindler we discussed on Beauty and Love.
The sound is better on this video but the other one is more complete in terms of Schindler's thought.  https://youtu.be/b26vvB3-97g

Here's the one with the poor sound, but the depth of meaning.
https://youtu.be/ei6eRK28oac

A visual summary of Stephen Wolfram's theory of everything (you can find everything about it at https://wolframphysics.org
https://www.wolframphysics.org/visual-summary/

Here are the videos of Stephen Wolfram's theory of everything.
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUZtF8ldv2sK2AEWlRfwalgS

Love v. Truth, a discussion of Iris Murdoch's philosophy
https://youtu.be/V48TOzXpueQ

Living out Holy Moments, the Ascent of the Heart (re: Iris Murdoch)
https://youtu.be/77zMqCeEyik

The Sovereignty of the Good (more Iris Murdoch)
https://youtu.be/WqkXou9RjXc
